abstract: Enzon’s investors, including billionaire Carl C. Icahn, are hoping to use an unusual Delaware law to oust the biotech’s chairman and chief executive, in what may be a litmus test for future proxy battles.
snippet: Enzon’s investors, including billionaire Carl C. Icahn, are hoping to use an unusual Delaware law to oust the biotech’s chairman and chief executive, in what may be a litmus test for future proxy battles.
lead_paragraph: AnEnzon investor is hoping to use an unusual Delaware law to oust the biotech’s chairman and chief executive, in what may be a litmus test for future proxy battles, The New York Post reported.

headline.main: Enzon Investor Tests Law in Bid to Oust Chief
